Your payment of {{amount}} {{currency}} for the {{planType}} plan has failed.

Attempt: {{retryCount}} of 3
Next retry: {{nextRetryDate}}

Dear {{businessName}},

Your final payment attempt of {{amount}} {{currency}} for the {{planType}} plan has failed.

Your account has entered a grace period until {{gracePeriodEnd}}. Please update your payment method before this date to avoid account suspension.

Update payment: {{reactivationUrl}}

Thank you,
Madna Loyalty Team
